i do not like my reputation.

participant_2.background:
I have a pet dog who is always happy to see me, no matter how bad my day was.
I have a Windows computer because it is compatible with my third-party PDF reader.
I am moving to be closer to my favorite pasta restaurant.
I'm looking forward to a career in education and finding ways to incorporate fruit into my child's diet.
I'm going to a horror movie marathon with my friends to support a local charity.

content.text: Good! I'm really excited about a horror movie marathon I'm going to with my friends this weekend. I'm also looking forward to a career in education and finding ways to incorporate fruit into my child's diet.

Oh my god that sounds amazing! I'm so jealous. I love horror movies, but I haven't had a chance to watch a good one in a while. I'm also on the hunt for a new job, and I'm hoping to find something in education. I love kids, and I think it would be a great career.
That's so exciting! I'm sure you'll find the perfect job. Education is such a rewarding field. And horror movies are always fun! I love the adrenaline rush you get from being scared.
Thanks! I hope so too. And yeah, horror movies are the best! I love the feeling of being on the edge of your seat the whole time.
Me too! I'm always looking for new horror movies to watch. Do you have any recommendations?
Oh yeah, I have a few. I just watched The Conjuring last weekend, and it was really good. I also really liked The Conjuring 2, and The Babadook.
Those all sound great! I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the recommendations!
No problem! I'm always happy to help a fellow horror movie fan.
Hey, what do you think about cats?
I love cats! They're so cute and cuddly. I have two of my own.
That's awesome! I love cats too. I have a dog, but I've always wanted a cat.
Dogs are great too! I love dogs. I think all pets are amazing.
Me too! I'm so glad we have something in common.
